title: 5 kill streak = no shutdown?
body: So managing to kill a fed champion doesn't grant a shutdown anymore?

replies.body: Could just as likely be a bug since bounties were changed in the latest patch- you may have found a bug as PBR testing is SUPER limited pool of people (we'll say 10-20k for humor) and not many of those games are going to be on TTL. Maybe 30-50 of them. In those 30-50 games, it would be incredibly easy for an oversight like this given the recent changes and it not being the "primary" game mode.

Mmm, thats twisted tree line. As I don't play it, I can't say with absolute accuracy- but don't bounties work differently/tuned for the smaller team, specifically that information is going to be a lot harder to find but I did find this:

Average is determined by dividing the enemy team's minion and monster gold by four, rather than five, based on the four sources of income on Summoner's Rift (top/mid/bot/jungle). Modes with smaller teams divide by the number of champs per team instead (ex. 3 for Twisted Treeline).
